dc_title_s: America Septentrionalis novissima: America Meridionalis accuratissima.; America Meridionalis accuratissima
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Title is divided into two decorative cartouches one for North America and the other for South America. Cartouches contain vignettes portraying explorers and native peoples. From his "Atlas Contractus". 1 map: hand col.; 47 x 56 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
